content: A new proposal has been announced: Add support for MIR opt unit tests via a new -Z flag #502. It will be announced at the next meeting to try and draw attention to it, but usually MCPs are not discussed during triage meetings. If you think this would benefit from discussion amongst the team, consider proposing a design meeting.
@nagisa let me know if this doesn't address any of the things you wanted to know from a write-up
really like this, as i am not really involved with mir opts I won't second that myself
@T-compiler: Proposal #502 has been seconded, and will be approved in 10 days if no objections are raised.
